FuncDef: The display multicast-rui statistic all command displays statistics about multicast hot backup of access users.
Examples: RUI Master send total:0          RUI Slave receive total:0
RUI Master send:0                RUI Slave receive:0
RUI Master send:0                RUI Slave receive:0
RUI Master send:0                RUI Slave receive:0
RUI Master send:0                RUI Slave receive:0
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
In the multicast hot backup scenario, the master and slave routers duplicate IGMP messages sent by a terminal and send them to each other. The display multicast-rui statistic all command displays statistics about IGMP messages.
Follow-up Procedure
To clear statistics about IGMP messages on the router, run the reset multicast-rui statistic all command.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
